title: Inspect Incoming Goods for Quality
description: A shipment of a new product arrives from a supplier, and a sample must be inspected for quality before the shipment is accepted.

tasks.description: Randomly select a sample of items from the newly arrived shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A worker pulls a sample of 10 units for inspection.

tasks.description: Inspect the sample against the product's quality specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspection reveals minor cosmetic defects that are outside the acceptable tolerance.

tasks.description: Reject the shipment and notify the supplier of the quality issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent formally rejects the shipment and communicates the reason to the supplier.
